summary: Documentary chronicling the famed street artist's "31 works of art in 31 days" in New York city.
cast: Beth Stebner|Keegan Hamilton|Jaime Rojo|Steven P. Harrington|Rebecca Encalada|Robert Stevens|Luna Park|Caroline Caldwell|R.J. Rushmore|Hrag Vartanian|Brad Lander|Marie Cecile Flageul|Meres|Claw Money|Carol Diehl|Stephan Keszler|Andrew Russeth|Carlo McCormick|Ed Koch|Saul Zabar|Ruben Diaz Jr.|Billy Pena|Elias Pena|David Raper
title: Banksy Does New York
